sentences.en: Fires have burned up 180,000 acres of timber.
sentences.cn: 大火烧光了18万英亩的木材。

sentences.en: Half of the north-west's timber land is public property.
sentences.cn: 西北部的一半林地是公共财产。

sentences.en: He supplied housebuilders with modern timber frames.
sentences.cn: 他给房屋建筑商提供了现代的木构架。

sentences.en: It wants timber to come, where possible, from sustainably managed sources.
sentences.cn: 其要求木材尽可能来自可持续发展林。

sentences.en: The builders will have to strengthen the existing joists with additional timber.
sentences.cn: 施工人员将不得不另外用木料加固现有的托梁。

sentences.en: The crew lashed cargoes of timber down.
The timber is graded according to its thickness.
These Severn Valley woods have been exploited for timber since Saxon times.
sentences.cn: 从撒克逊时代起就开始采伐塞文山谷的这些树林获取木料。

sentences.en: These trees need more time to grow into useful timber.
sentences.cn: 这些树不够年头,还没成材呢.

sentences.en: They braced up the old house with balks of timber.
sentences.cn: 他们用梁木加固旧房子.

sentences.en: They have been bartering wheat for cotton and timber.
sentences.cn: 他们一直用小麦交换棉花和木材。

sentences.en: We found him to be the right sort of timber.
sentences.cn: 我们发现他是真正的人才.

trans.tran_cn: 木材，木料，（用于建筑或制作物品的）树木，用材林，林场，素质
trans.tran_en: wood used for building or making things
